column5: Thought I'd share the big fish of our trip this year. Caught on the last day of the trip. We do our fair share of trolling between jigging for walleyes. Luke had been tearing up the pike trolling deep diving husky jerk, but when I told him there were big Musky in the part of Lac Suel we decided to fish the last day he went for my biggest bait, a 12" jointed believer. Would not have been my choice but I've learned it doesn't matter what I think up there, let him put what ever lure he wants on and odds are he'll catch something and it means a lot more when he picked out the lure whether its from my box or a new one he picks out at the tackle shop on the way up. Great memories!
Your son is hooked for life. Congrats on the big musky.
Sweet fish. It's almost as big as he is.
No need to hold that one close to the camera! Great fish!

Luke is a lucky young man. Having a dad who spends time with him is more of a treasure than any fish he will ever catch. Great job and please keep us up-dated on your future trips. Thanks for the story - Stu
Love it! Great Job to your son. Been taking my 11 year old for the past 3 years to Lac Seul. Doesnt bother me a bit that he out-fishes me. Keep taking your son with Dad!
